text: int main ( ) { int t ; int n ; int arr [ max ] ; int i ; int x ; int y ; int check = 0 ; int count = 0 ; int j ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } count = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { x = arr [ i ] ; check = 0 ; for ( j = i + 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( x <= arr [ j ] ) { x = arr [ j ] ; check = 1 ; } else break ; } if ( check == 1 ) count ++ ; } printf ( "%d\n" , n + count ) ; } return 0 ; }
